DOC.brief_title: Effect Hemodialysis PK JTZ-951 Subjects With End-stage Renal Disease
DOC.criteria: Subjects ESRD receive maintenance hemodialysis least 12 week prior Screening Visit Body weight ( postdialysis weight ) great 45.0 kg body mass index 20.0 40.0 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) Screening Visit Acute coronary syndrome ( e.g. , myocardial infarction ) within 1 year prior admission Uncontrolled hypertension Screening Visit Day 1
